title: Chocolate Chip Cream Cheese Muffins
ingredients: ['1 (200g) tub cream cheese, softened', '55g butter, softened', '1 egg, room temperature', '125ml single cream', '1/2 teaspoon vanilla extract', '250g plain flour', '100g caster sugar', '3 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '50g chocolate chips']
